author: Reticuli

text:
I used to have a 3DO long ago, and Starfighter was one of those games. Starfighter is one of the most tranquil air combat simulators you could ever play. Just landing in that motheship was one of my treasured memories from that game. That, and burning those mountains in those lovely polygons.

Oh, and how about that going up as high as you could and then going all the way down to earth. Its quite exhilarating! ^_^

author: Yoshi92

text: I remember I'd play the 3DO version (which is supposed to be the best) at a friend's house. It probably aged badly but it was really nice looking and fun at the time, flying around and shooting at different targets or trying to land inside another moving carrier. Thats and the quality soundtrack.
